}}'''Mungo Baggins''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Mungo was the eldest child of [[Balbo Baggins]] and [[Berylla Boffin]]. He married [[Laura Grubb]], and they had five children together: [[Bungo Baggins|Bungo]], [[Belba Baggins|Belba]], [[Longo Baggins|Longo]], [[Linda Baggins|Linda]] and [[Bingo Baggins|Bingo]].<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>
